info.brief_description: Are you a hungry guy or girl, or person trying to stay out of people's bellies.
info.description:
In this world a new power has arisen. Almost fifty percent of the people in the world have the power to swallow other people whole. Now there are some regulations that are put into place so that there isn't total chaos. People are not allowed to eat people that have the power. The power doesn't come out in people until the age of fifteen, so people fourteen and under are off limits for swallowing. The very sick crime of a guy eating a guy is punishable by death, by having a jug of acid poured on the criminal slowly until he is dead. Girls eating girls is just fine. Since this power appears when teens enter high school, graduation numbers are down. The Seniors usually have a contest to see who can eat the most underclassmen before graduation. There are restaurants that capture unsuspecting people and put them on the menu for the people with the power; some restaurants just do that like a sushi restaurant for people with the power.

Rules:
1.) NO Gay stuff. So no guys eating guys;;; girls eating girls is just fine, since it is hot.
2.)No animals. No furries, scalies, and whatever else.
3.)The minimum age for characters is 15 years old, the maximum age is 35. When the main character is a guy, there are to be no other guys in that branch of the interactive. If the main character is a girl, there can be only one guy at a time, so if you want to add a second guy, kill the first one off or have him move away or whatever, just, no having two guys in the same scene.
4.)Along with the age thing, it means nobody that is under or over the age limit is to be in or mentioned in the chapter.
5.)Editions are to be written in the second person perspective; example, "You went to find help."
6.)Editions must be at least six sentences long, (i.e. A paragraph). Be descriptive. Description is what gives a story substance. Use adjectives and adverbs, they make a story more in-depth and interesting, like you were actually there experiencing it.
7.)Spell and grammatical check editions before adding them, I will not tolerate misspellings and grammatical errors.

Follow the rules perfectly and I won't delete. Have fun.
